# Workers Compensation

Table of Workers Compensation Presumptions, derived from @NCIC2020.

```{r wc_presumptions, message-FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

data_load_path <- here::here("data","wc_presumptions_2020-08-01.csv")
d <- readr::read_csv(data_load_path)
d$source <- paste0("<a href='",d$source_url,"'target='_blank'>",d$source,"</a>")

library(dplyr)

d2 <- d %>%
  select(state, source, date, type, workers_covered, date_expired)

library(DT)

datatable(d2, escape=FALSE) %>% 
      formatStyle(columns = 1:5, `font-size` = '11px')

```
